column4: OK, OK, so no one here empties trash but I need to empty trash. I'm using Hoary (installed on HD) and running out of disk space. Thanks.
bottom right trash icon, right-click, select "Empty Wastebasket"?
is it apt-get -b install mondo ? or apt-get -b source mondo?
thank you now I see it !!!! Ah, so much better. Thanks.
